# device

**Instance Property**

The device to query for sample data.

## Declaration

```swift
var device: SRDevice { get set }
```

## Discussion

If the app doesn’t define a value for this property, the framework queries the current device. To get a list of available devices, the app calls [doc://com.apple.sensorkit/documentation/SensorKit/SRSensorReader/fetchDevices()] on its sensor reader.

## Selecting the Device

- **SRDevice**: A representation of a device that provides sample data.
